div.p: WOULD LIKE A REPLICA OF THE NOTES, GO TO BILLO’REILLY.COM.
AND LAST NIGHT I SCOLDED MONICA CROWLEY FOR NOT STAYING ON
TOPIC. ALLEN REFUSED TO ANSWER A YES OR
NO QUESTION, MONICA JUST WANTED TO USE THE SEGMENT TO ATTACK THE
PRESIDENT. NOW, WE LIKE MONICA AND COOMBS,
AND WE HAVE THEM EVERY WEEK. BUT I BELIEVE THEY WASTED YOUR
TIME AND THAT IS NOT OKAY WITH ME.
AND CARRIE SAYS THIS IS THE FIRST TIME YOU WERE EVER MEAN TO
MONICA, WOW, I CAN’T BELIEVE IT. I WAS NOT MEAN, I WAS FIRM, THEY
BOTH KNEW WHAT THE TOPIC WAS BUT CHOSE NOT TO ADDRESS IT.
THEREFORE, IT WAS ANGST, DON’T LET ANYONE WASTE YOUR TIME.
IT IS VALUABLE. AND I’M CERTAINLY NOT GOING TO
WASTE IT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FACTOR
